attributes.action: Remove Theresa May as Prime Minister and Replace with Jacob Rees Mogg
attributes.background: Theresa May was entrusted to deliver Brexit on the 29 March 2019. Through her failure in negotiating an appropriate deal, the law was changed to accommodate her incompetence. She has persistently lied on when the UK will leave the EU.

rejection.details:
The Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.

After a general election, the Queen decides who to invite to form a Government. In practice, this is usually the leader of the political party that wins the most seats in a general election. You can find out more about this here:
https://www.royal.uk/queen-and-government
